metadata.name: vw_rpt_nplus_monthly_marketing_subs
metadata.comment:
## Implementation Detail
*   Date        : 08/14/2020
*   Version     : 1.0
*   TableName   : vw_rpt_nplus_monthly_marketing_subs
*   Schema      : fds_nplus
*   Contributor : Hima Dasan
*   Description : vw_rpt_nplus_monthly_marketing_subs view consist of Actuals,forecast and Budget for adds and Disconnects For Roku,Apple and mlbam (Monthly)

## Maintenance Log
* Date : 08/14/2020 ; Developer: Hima Dasan; Change: Initial Version

free_adds_budget.comment: Total trial adds budget for the month
free_adds_budget.name: free_adds_budget

paid_adds_budget.comment: Budget for all paid subscriptions who have paid for the first time and all paid winback subscriptions for the month
paid_adds_budget.name: paid_adds_budget

free_disconnects_budget.comment: Budget for Total trial losses for the month
free_disconnects_budget.name: free_disconnects_budget

paid_disconnects_budget.comment: Budget for Total Paid Losses for the month
paid_disconnects_budget.name: paid_disconnects_budget

free_adds_actuals.comment: Total trial adds for the month
free_adds_actuals.name: free_adds_actuals

paid_adds_actuals.comment: All paid subscriptions who have paid for the first time and all paid winback subscriptions for the month
paid_adds_actuals.name: paid_adds_actuals

free_disconnects_actuals.comment: Total trial losses for the month
free_disconnects_actuals.name: free_disconnects_actuals

paid_disconnects_actuals.comment: Total Paid Losses for the month
paid_disconnects_actuals.name: paid_disconnects_actuals

free_adds_fye.comment: Total trial adds for the month forecasted
free_adds_fye.name: free_adds_fye

paid_adds_fye.comment: All paid subscriptions who have paid for the first time and all paid winback subscriptions for the month forecasted
paid_adds_fye.name: paid_adds_fye

free_disconnects_fye.comment: Total trial losses for the month forecasted
free_disconnects_fye.name: free_disconnects_fye

paid_disconnects_fye.comment: Total Paid Losses for the month forecasted
paid_disconnects_fye.name: paid_disconnects_fye

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

event_date.comment: Date and timestamp of the scheduled live events as received from LES
event_date.name: event_date

ghw_start_date.comment: date of Event Date minus 6 days
ghw_start_date.name: ghw_start_date

ghw_end_date.comment: date of Event date plus 2 days
ghw_end_date.name: ghw_end_date

event.comment: concatenated text of PPV event name and year
event.name: event

daily_paid_adds_cnt.comment: Daily count of paid subscriber adds
daily_paid_adds_cnt.name: daily_paid_adds_cnt

daily_trial_adds_cnt.comment: Daily count of trial subscriber adds
daily_trial_adds_cnt.name: daily_trial_adds_cnt

daily_promo_paid_add_cnt.comment: Daily count of total promo paid subscription add
daily_promo_paid_add_cnt.name: daily_promo_paid_add_cnt

daily_paid_adds_cnt_new.comment: custom filed based on order type and Daily count of paid subscriber adds
daily_paid_adds_cnt_new.name: daily_paid_adds_cnt_new

daily_paid_adds_cnt_winback.comment: custom filed based on order type winback and Daily count of paid subscriber adds
daily_paid_adds_cnt_winback.name: daily_paid_adds_cnt_winback

forecast_paid_winbacks.comment: Roll up of all paid winback subscriptions for the day
forecast_paid_winbacks.name: forecast_paid_winbacks

forecast_new_paid.comment: Roll up of all paid subscriptions who have paid for the first time
forecast_new_paid.name: forecast_new_paid

forecast_free_trial_subs.comment: Total trial adds for the day
forecast_free_trial_subs.name: forecast_free_trial_subs

metadata.name: rpt_network_ppv_liveplusvod
metadata.comment:
## Implementation Detail
*   Date        : 07/28/2020
*   Version     : 1.0
*   ViewName    : rpt_network_ppv_liveplusvod
*   Schema : fds_nplus
*   Contributor : Lakshman Murugeshan
*   Description : View contains the information related to Live NXT and HOF evenet

## Maintenance Log
* Date : 07/28/2020 ; Developer: Lakshman Murugeshan ; DBT & Python Automation: Sudhakar; Change: Initial Version

asset_id.comment: The ID for a YouTube channel. In the YouTube Data API, this is the value of a channelresources id property.
asset_id.name: asset_id

platform.comment: platform name i.e. Facebook, Youtube, etc
platform.name: platform

views.comment: number of views for the event
views.name: views

us_views.comment: number of views in US for the event
us_views.name: us_views

per_us_views.comment: percentage of views in US against overall views
per_us_views.name: per_us_views

monthly_per_change_views.comment: monthly percentage changes in the number of views
monthly_per_change_views.name: monthly_per_change_views

yearly_per_change_views.comment: yearly percentage changes in the number of views
yearly_per_change_views.name: yearly_per_change_views

overall_rank.comment: overall rank of the event based on the views
overall_rank.name: overall_rank

yearly_rank.comment: yearly rank of the event based on the views
yearly_rank.name: yearly_rank

event_brand.comment: event brand i.e. PPV, NXT or Hall of Fame
event_brand.name: event_brand

report_name.comment: name of the report i.e. Kickoff show, The Bump etc
report_name.name: report_name

data_level.comment: identifier for Live data and Live+VOD data
data_level.name: data_level
